item.title: Hussar Magicbud
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: COMFORTABLE and SECURE FIT: With Ergonomic design and silicone ear hooks, Magicbuds Bluetooth Headphones are secure behind your ears and rest comfortably in the ear canal. Premium soft smooth silicone gel surface helps sweat proof.
item.content:encoded: COMFORTABLE and SECURE FIT: With Ergonomic design and silicone ear hooks, Magicbuds Bluetooth Headphones are secure behind your ears and rest comfortably in the ear canal. Premium soft smooth silicone gel surface helps sweat proof.

item.title: Rockerz 370
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: boAt Rockerz 370 is a wireless headset that has been ergonomically designed to meet the needs of music lovers. The headphones come equipped with the latest Bluetooth v5. 0 for instant wireless connectivity. Its powerful 300mAh battery provides playtime of up to 8 hours for an extended audio bliss.
item.content:encoded:
Brand boAt
Model Name Rockerz 370
Colour Buoyant Black
Form Factor On Ear
Connectivity Technology Wireless

About this item

  • Rockerz 370 come equipped with latest Bluetooth v5.0 for instant wireless connectivity
  • The powerful 300mAh battery provides up to 8 Hours of audio bliss
  • 40mm Dynamic Drivers supply immersive High Definition sound
  • The headset has padded earcups for a comfortable experience
  • The headphone has been ergonomically and aesthetically designed for a seamless experience
  • One can connect to Rockerz 370 via dual modes for connectivity in the form of Bluetooth and AUX
  • 1 year warranty from the date of purchase.

item.title: Rockerz 558 Sunburn Edition
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: boAt Rockerz 558 is an over-ear wireless headset that has been ergonomically designed to meet the needs of music lovers. The headphones come equipped with latest Bluetooth v5.0 for instant wireless connectivity.
item.content:encoded: boAt Rockerz 558 is an over-ear wireless headset that has been ergonomically designed to meet the needs of music lovers. The headphones come equipped with latest Bluetooth v5.0 for instant wireless connectivity. Its powerful 500mAh battery provides a playtime of up to 20 hours for an extended audio bliss. Its 50mm dynamic drivers help supply immersive musical experience to the user with immersive sound. The user can utilize the headset via dual connectivity in the form of Bluetooth and AUX. Driver type – Moving coil driver.
